MudBlazor Presentation Documentation

This directory contains the markdown source files for the MudBlazor presentation documentation.

Building the Static Site

The markdown files are converted to a static HTML website using Gulp.

Setup

First, install the dependencies:

npm install

Build

Generate the static HTML site:

npm run build

The generated files will be in the docs/_build/ directory.

Watch Mode

Automatically rebuild when markdown files change:

npm run watch

Serve

Build and serve the site with live reload:

npm run serve

This will start a local server at http://localhost:8080 and automatically reload when files change.

File Structure

  • Presentation.md - Main presentation page
  • Steps/ - Step-by-step guides
  • styles.css - Stylesheet for the generated HTML
  • _build/ - Generated static HTML files (gitignored)
